content.rendered:
Install Bibledit on Windows

Bibledit runs on Windows 7 and higher.

  1. Install .NET Framework 4.5.2 or higher on Windows 7.
  2. Download Bibledit.
  3. Install Bibledit.
  4. Start it through the menu.

Connect to Bibledit Cloud via menu Settings / Cloud.

Give it enough time to download all the data from Bibledit Cloud.

Bibledit is now ready for online and offline use.

Home
Review
